  "description": "BrandEye Media Limited is a full-service media strategy and buying agency. At BrandEye Media, we combine cutting-edge research tools and our &lsquo;glocal&rsquo; expertise to develop winning strategies and buying solutions for our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Art Director for Creative &amp; Content (Media &amp; Advertising Industry)

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Work on design/ creative briefs across the entire BrandEye, Brainbox and DigiBreed businesses and on all assigned clients and brands to achieve set strategic and campaign objectives.
	Develop creative strategies and innovative ideas for other business functions and on brands managed and ensure that such plans are implemented to time.
	Ensure delivery of assigned task by business units and assigned brands in a timely manner and at the expected output level.
	Management of all Client and Agency creative Assets to ensure adherence to standard guidelines.
	Ensure prompt delivery of the invoice and update of the savings and planned billing tracker as shared by Finance for the creative team.
	Be visible, lead &amp; earn clients&#39; respect (across key clients), occasionally attend meetings with priority clients that we offer Creative &amp; Production services.
	Participate in internal/collaborative brainstorm sessions, creative/content development, ideation planning sessions (sometimes with client reps), tissue sessions etc. Aimed at finding &amp; deciding brands&#39; creative directions and winning ideas for various clients.
	Ensure safe keep of all creative materials, brand book, and other vital creative materials of Client, Agency and others shared with the team


Responsibilities


	Work in the creative team to deliver creatives in line with Client brief and need. Work across the business units to deliver creative support that would delight the Client
	Employ research to identify new tools for working and take advantage of these tools to develop creatives that would delight Client and help other business units deliver on their creative needs.
	Ensure regular meetings with client and generate meaningful suggestions and ideas that would help improve agency offerings to Client and bring about more cordial working relationship between client and agency.
	Ensure delivery of innovative Ideas to Client that would be beneficial in delivering increased billings and improve Clients business.
	Co-ordinate and take responsibility for the generation of properly aligned and error-free creatives for campaigns and pitches.
	Maintain a repository of all creative tools, brand book and other documents relevant to Creative development and this is to be updated regularly.
	Work seamlessly with other agency functions to ensure seamless implementation of campaign activities.
	Ensure the generation of Daily, weekly and monthly and appropriate end of campaign reports to show creative activities and recommendations for effectiveness
	Ensure adequate negotiation with vendors for production of creative work to be undertaken by the team.
	Ensure proper documentation of all invoices and financial transactions as per agreed contract and terms.
	Ensure the development of team members in the Creative team to learn and develop skills required.


Requirements
Knowledge:


	Strong knowledge of the use of creative tools for 3D/2D as well as other creative designs as required. Ability to work with a range of Creative tools, as well as a strong understanding of global and local Creative practices
	Very sound creative and innovative skills that would deliver exceptional designs.
	Strong understanding of client&rsquo;s business needs and marketing objectives is key for this role.


Skills:


	Strong knowledge on the use of creative tools for 3D/2D as well as other creative designs as required. Ability to work with a range of Creative tools, as well as a strong understanding of global and local Creative practices
	Very sound creative and innovative skills that would deliver exceptional designs.
	A strong understanding of the client&rsquo;s business needs and marketing objectives is key for this role.


Behaviours:


	You possess a positive can-do spirit. Achieving results in the right way (professionally, honestly and upholding business reputation and core values
	You think strategically &amp; holistically to ensure the development of new creative forms and business building ideas for Client.
	You drive &amp; demonstrate business integrity, transparency in your dealings.


Renumeration
Industry Standard.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to:&nbsp;info@brandeyemedia.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

        RareVirtue Consulting Limited is a full-service HR and capacity-building firm dedicated to fostering competence, accountability, productivity, and organizational growth within the corporate sector. We provide tailored, results-driven solutions aligned with our clients' goals, visions, and annual targets. Our commitment to enhancing employee competence and operational effectiveness positions us as a trusted partner to diverse organizations across various industries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Description

	We are seeking a highly driven and proactive Sales Executive to join our client’s real estate team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying and pursuing new sales opportunities, developing and maintaining client relationships, and meeting established sales targets. The role also includes:
	Conducting market research and analyzing real estate trends
	Creating and delivering persuasive sales presentations
	Negotiating deals and preparing necessary documentation
	Maintaining detailed sales records using CRM tools
	Collaborating with team members to optimize sales strategies
	Providing excellent customer service to ensure long-term client satisfaction.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree or certification in Sales, Business Administration, Marketing, or any related field
	Minimum of 2 years of proven sales experience in the real estate sector
	Strong background in Sales, Business Development, and Client Relationship Management
	Excellent Negotiation, Communication, and Presentation skills
	Ability to conduct Market Research and interpret trends
	Proficiency in CRM software and strong organizational abilities
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a dynamic, fast-paced environment
	Self-motivated with excellent time management and proactive problem-solving skills.


Compensation


	Salary: N150,000 – N200,000 monthly
	Commission: 4% on every successful deal closed.


Method of Application

	To be able to promptly identify, measure, monitor, manage, minimize and report risks that may impact negatively on the achievement of our business objectives in line with the enterprise risk tolerance and business strategy.

	Operational risk assessment of all departments within the enterprise and the company subsidiaries.
	Internal control to ensure operational effectiveness and efficiency.
	Risk advisement for various departments as per new products, implementation, change requests and system integration with UP to mitigate operational, reputational, strategic and regulatory risk.
	Preparation of Operational Risk report to Senior Management.
	Work closely with other depts. within the organization to investigate and resolve alleged fraudulent incidents.
	Escalate issues with potential for negative industry and/or corporate exposure.

	The staff will also assist in providing riskmitigating factors to the units involved, remediation options and process improvement ideas.
	Follow up with business units to design and implement controls and action plans to mitigate operational risk thereby ensuring the effective running of the enterprise business.

	Good reporting skills and attention to details.
	Proven experience in maintaining internal &amp; external relationships through strong interpersonal and team working skills.
